description:
Yokubaru are the main monsters created by the dark magic that the minions of Dokurokushe use. All Yokubaru have a lilac colored skull face with purple horns coming from the top and their eyes are red and green. The Yokubaru can only be created if two objects are merged together by the Dark Magician`s dark magic.
Source: prettycure.wikia.com
name: Yokubaru
